content: Yeah, I'm really stoked to ride Steel Vengeance! The theming and queue sound amazing, and I love the idea of being immersed in an abandoned mining town. I'm also curious about the preshow and how it sets the tone for the ride. Thanks for the details! By the way, have you heard about the new coaster they're building at Knott's Berry Farm? I heard it's going to be a big deal.
